name.description: The name of the attribute. Descriptive name to be used in the UI

type.description: The type of the attribute. One of: Text, Number, Date, Boolean, Reference

multiplicity.description: The multiplicity of the attribute, which means how many values can be stored in the attribute.

description.description: Description of the attribute. Do not replicate information in the description field, which is already present in the type or multiplicity field.
